mapper.sql: select stp.package_id, stp.package_name, stp.remark, stp.menu_check_strictly, stp.status, stp.del_flag, stp.create_dept, stp.create_by, stp.create_time, stp.update_by, stp.update_time from sys_tenant_package stp
mapper.select:
and stp.del_flag = '0' and stp.package_name like concat(concat('%', #{packageName}), '%') and stp.status = #{status}
order by stp.create_time desc

select stp.package_id, stp.package_name, stp.remark, stp.menu_check_strictly, stp.status, stp.del_flag, stp.create_dept, stp.create_by, stp.create_time, stp.update_by, stp.update_time, stpm.menu_id from sys_tenant_package stp left join sys_tenant_package_menu stpm on stp.package_id = stpm.package_id where stp.package_id = #{packageId} and stp.del_flag = '0'
select count(stp.package_id) from sys_tenant_package stp join sys_tenant_package_menu stpm on stp.package_id = stpm.package_id where stpm.menu_id = #{menuId} and stp.del_flag = '0'
